casebody.data:
Lamar vs. The State of Georgia. Judgment affirmed. October 2, 1883. Hall, Justice.

1. There was no ruling, charge or decision in this case exception to which was not properly abandoned in this court.

2. The verdict may not have been required, but was sustained by the evidence.

3. This court cannot consider any errors not plainly specified in the bill of exceptions. Code, §4251.
